message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it presents a great value proposition, especially considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but the price of $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I am unable to meet at $13,000. I would like to propose a final price of $12,500. I hope this is within your range.
